Romans__03.1: What advantage then hath the Jew, or what is the profit of circumcision?
Romans__03.2: Much every way. First indeed, because the words of God were committed to them.
Romans__03.3: For what if some of them have not believed? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect? God forbid.
Romans__03.4:
But<u>
                God is true
               </u>; and every man a liar, as it is written, That thou mayest be justified in thy words, and mayest overcome when thou art judged.
Romans__03.5: But if our injustice commend the justice of God, what shall we say? Is God unjust, who executeth wrath?
Romans__03.6: (I speak according to man.) God forbid: otherwise how shall God judge this world?
Romans__03.7: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie, unto his glory, why am I also yet judged as a sinner?
Romans__03.8: And not rather (as we are slandered, and as some affirm that we say) let us do evil, that there may come good? whose damnation is just.
Romans__03.9: What then? Do we excel them? No, not so. For we have charged both Jews, and Greeks, that they are all under sin.
Romans__03.10:
As it is written:<u>
                There is not any man just
               </u>.
Romans__03.11: There is none that understandeth, there is none that seeketh after God.
Romans__03.12: All have turned out of the way; they are become unprofitable together: there is none that doth good, there is not so much as one.
Romans__03.13: Their throat is an open sepulchre; with their tongues they have dealt deceitfully. The venom of asps is under their lips.
Romans__03.14: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness:
Romans__03.15: Their feet swift to shed blood:
Romans__03.16: Destruction and misery in their ways:
Romans__03.17: And the way of peace they have not known:
Romans__03.18: There is no fear of God before their eyes.
Romans__03.19: Now we know, that what things soever the law speaketh, it speaketh to them that are in the law; that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may be made subject to God.
Romans__03.20: Because by the works of the law no flesh shall be justified before him. For by the law is the knowledge of sin.
Romans__03.21: But now without the law the justice of God is made manifest, being witnessed by the law and the prophets.
Romans__03.22: Even the justice of God, by faith of Jesus Christ, unto all and upon all them that believe in him: for there is no distinction:
Romans__03.23: For all have sinned, and do need the glory of God.
Romans__03.24: Being justified freely by his grace, through the redemption, that is in Christ Jesus,
Romans__03.25: Whom God hath proposed to be a propitiation, through faith in his blood, to the shewing of his justice, for the remission of former sins,
Romans__03.26: Through the forbearance of God, for the shewing of his justice in this time; that he himself may be just, and the justifier of him, who is of the faith of Jesus Christ.
Romans__03.27: Where is then thy boasting? It is excluded. By what law? Of works? No, but by the law of faith.
Romans__03.28:
For we account a man to be justified<u>
                by faith
               </u>, without the works of the law.
Romans__03.29: Is he the God of the Jews only? Is he not also of the Gentiles? Yes, of the Gentiles also.
Romans__03.30: For it is one God, that justifieth circumcision by faith, and uncircumcision through faith.
Romans__03.31: Do we, then, destroy the law through faith? God forbid: but we establish the law.
